divs: Sighting Detailsi was standing at my window looking at the stars i spotted an bright object 5 to 10 kilometers from here very close to earth it was just hovering for about 3-4 minutes then started to move stright left in a slow way bud faster than a normal airplain the strange thing was the lights on it when on the whole time of the sighting not a single blink from it so i knowed its was something special , bud it flyed behind my neighbor's roof so i couldent see it anymore.. i was very calm at the time of the sighting, bud still a little excited =)
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Copenhagen
There were no other sightings in Copenhagen on or around January 26th 2011
